WebGL drawElements Test

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".

PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : can call gl.DrawElements with UNSIGNED_SHORT
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : can call gl.DrawElements with UNSIGNED_BYTE
PASS getError was expected value: INVALID_ENUM : gl.DrawElements with QUAD_STRIP should return INVALID_ENUM
PASS getError was expected value: INVALID_ENUM : gl.DrawElements with QUADS should return INVALID_ENUM
PASS getError was expected value: INVALID_ENUM : gl.DrawElements with POLYGON should return INVALID_ENUM
PASS getError was expected value: INVALID_ENUM : gl.DrawElements should return INVALID_ENUM with UNSIGNED_INT
PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
